p.5: This position will be responsible for managing complex data and reporting to better assist management in maximizing resources in various departments or lines of business. This role requires a thorough understanding of Statistical Analysis and data methodology using SQL and analytical skills for Modeling/Analytical responsibilities.

li: Conduct data analysis in support of a variety of analytic solutions using SQL and other analytical tools like Alteryx, Tableau
li.1: Build, Maintain, & Deploy Predictive Models for variety of business purposes
li.2: Capture, develop, and document data definitions, business rules, and data quality requirements
li.3: Integrate data from multiple sources to produce requested or required data elements
li.4: Work with other members of the team in producing monthly updates to key projects used company wide for forecasting and strategy creation.
li.5: Interpret data, analyze results, and provide insights to determine operational impact, trends, and opportunities
li.6: Develop reports and deliverables for management and communicate with all levels of stakeholders
li.7: Identify and define data quality improvements
li.8: Create and maintain report forms and formats, information dashboards, data generators, canned reports and other end-user information portals or resources
li.9: Ensure compliance with deliverable reporting requirements by performing quality data audits and analysis
li.10: Create specifications for reports based on business requests
li.11: Identify opportunities to use data to develop new strategies and improve business performance and utilize knowledge of mathematical modeling and other optimization methods to perform quantitative and qualitative data analysis

li: Knowledge & Experience with Statistics concepts like hypothesis testing, Regression Testing, percentile calculations, Distribution comparisons
li.1: Ability to read, write, speak and understand English
li.2: Ability to prioritize and organize effectively
li.3: Ability to work independently, as well as in a collaborative and dynamic team environment
li.4: Ability to handle multiple projects and priorities
li.5: Ability to analyze and interpret data
li.6: Ability to quickly identify business problems/opportunities
li.7: Ability to communicate orally and in writing in a clear and straightforward manner
li.8: Ability to communicate with all levels of management and company personnel
li.9: Ability to manage multiple projects at one time
li.10: Ability to document, prepare and present data-driven presentations
li.11: Knowledge of software applications such as Word, Excel, etc.
li.12: Experience with SQL - Creating Queries from Scratch & Understanding how to edit queries is crucial

li: Preferred to have knowledge of Alteryx, Teradata SQL
li.1: Programming skills in SAS, R, Python

li: Bachelor=E2=80=99s degree (Master=E2=80=99s preferred) in math, statistics, engineering or other quantitative field.
